display_long_description:
Welcome to the ultimate marble fantasy world of Marblecraft! Explore and try out every possibility related to marbles!

- In the mixed reality environment, build your own marble heaven in your living room or backyard! There are over a hundred diverse building modules, tracks, obstacles, themed decorations and preset systems! With easy-to-learn but powerful editor, you'll have a joyful building experience.
[media]

- Build marble track and watch them race! It's the F1 Marble Formula! Go on thrilling high-speed races with first person marble view or in god's view! Support live broadcasting and race-related features! Customize marbles with your favorite look! Experience mind-blowing racing gameplay!
[media]

- Play marble music with piano and watch them dance waltz! Marbles transform into masters of the piano and various musical instruments, and your favorite music flows down with the marbles! The marbles dance gracefully to the music, swirling and twirling in the endless 3D space!
[media]

- Global crafters can create together, share your top-notch creativity, and enjoy a shared library of works for collaborative creation! Create, record, shoot, and share your marble videos from multiple angles to gain video views for your channels!
[media]

Join our discord (https://discord.com/invite/MUJnQAvNbk) to create marble masterpiece together!
